16  package com.googlecode.download.maven.plugin.internal.cache;
17  
18  import com.googlecode.download.maven.plugin.internal.signature.Signatures;
19  import java.io.File;
20  import java.net.URI;
21  import java.nio.file.Files;
22  import java.nio.file.StandardCopyOption;
23  import org.apache.commons.codec.digest.DigestUtils;
24  
25  /**
26   * A class representing a download cache
27   * @author Mickael Istria (Red Hat Inc)
28   *
29   */
30  public final class DownloadCache {
31  
32  	private final File basedir;
33      private final FileIndex index;
34  
35  	public DownloadCache(File cacheDirectory) {
36          DownloadCache.createIfNeeded(cacheDirectory);
37          this.index = new FileBackedIndex(cacheDirectory);
38          this.basedir = cacheDirectory;
39      }
40  
41  	private String getEntry(URI uri, final Signatures signatures) {
42  		final String res = this.index.get(uri);
43  		if (res == null) {
44  			return null;
45  		}
46  		final File resFile = new File(this.basedir, res);
47  		if (resFile.isFile() && signatures.isValid(resFile)) {
48  			return res;
49  		} else {
50  			return null;
51  		}
52  	}
53  
54  	/**
55  	 * Get a File in the download cache. If no cache for this URL, or
56  	 * if expected signatures don't match cached ones, returns null.
57  	 * available in cache,
58  	 * @param uri URL of the file
59  	 * @param signatures Supplied signatures.
60  	 * @return A File when cache is found, null if no available cache
61  	 */
62      public File getArtifact(URI uri, final Signatures signatures) {
63  		final String res;
64  		try {
65  			this.index.getLock().lock();
66  			res = this.getEntry(uri, signatures);
67  		} finally {
68  			this.index.getLock().unlock();
69  		}
70  		if (res != null) {
71  			return new File(this.basedir, res);
72  		}
73  		return null;
74  	}
75  
76      public void install(URI uri, File outputFile, final Signatures signatures) throws Exception {
77  		try {
78  			this.index.getLock().lock();
79  			final String entry = this.getEntry(uri, signatures);
80  			if (entry != null) {
81  				return; // entry already here
82  			}
83  			final String fileName = String.format(
84  				"%s_%s", outputFile.getName(), DigestUtils.md5Hex(uri.toString())
85  			);
86  			Files.copy(
87  				outputFile.toPath(),
88  				new File(this.basedir, fileName).toPath(),
89  				StandardCopyOption.REPLACE_EXISTING
90  			);
91  			// update index
92  			this.index.put(uri, fileName);
93  		} finally {
94  			this.index.getLock().unlock();
95  		}
96  	}
97  
98      private static void createIfNeeded(final File basedir) {
99          if (!basedir.exists()) {
100             basedir.mkdirs();
101         } else if (!basedir.isDirectory()) {
102             throw new IllegalArgumentException(
103                 String.format(
104 					"Cannot use %s as cache directory: a file already exist there",
105                     basedir
106                 )
107             );
108         }
109     }
110 }
